entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
